channel.description:
This is my third offical version of the PK, it takes some suggestions from @ShadowKnight and @Alice also, so this isn't all mine. This class has to do with bounding to a target and helping them fulfill their goal. You can also bound with other players to see what they are claiming and to see if they could help you out in anyway
>**Ashen Communion (Passive) -** At the start of the game, you will know the identity of all non-NK neutral players. If the NK remains the last neutral alive while you have still not won, then their identity will be revealed to you. > >**Grim Determination (Passive) -** On days where no one die, you gain death immunity that night. You are immune to occupation, redirection and target changing > >**Peace Bond (Day) -** [Unavailable on Day 1] You will bind yourself to a target player. While bound to that player, you can hear all whispers to and from them. If they are neutral then all whispers will be hidden from the public. You may only be bound to one player at a time and you will only be unbounded on their death or if you change to a new target.- [Infinite uses] > >**Peace treaty (Day) -** Give your bounded target an extra use of all of their abilities, this includes day abilities. If they are a _[color=Grey ]Mercanary [/color]_ or a _[color=grey]Sellsword[/color]_ they will gain night immunity for the night. - [2 uses] > >**Showing your true colors (night) -** Visit a player. If they are Neutral, they will be healed and protected from negative effects. If your target is immune for this night, then the ability cost is refunded. - [4 uses] > >**Conspire (Night) -** [Unavailable before Night 2]. Create a group chat between yourself and a bonded player. - [Infinite uses] > >**Win Conditions -** help _2_ other neutral players complete their goals or win with the NK
>**Bonus gold** - If you achieved your goal by helping 2 neutral players win then any other neutral player you help achieve their goal, you will gain 25 gold at the end of the game.

item.title: [Class suggestion] Peace Keeper V.3
item.dc:creator: NosduhYons
item.description:
Right now since it itself takes up a neutral slot, there can be 2-3 other neutrals, 1 being NK. If one dies early, you either have a hard game getting the remaining ones or it is completely impossible to win. It would also be very hard to define helping a neutral achieve their goal, does that mean just voting execute on a fool? How could you help scorned if their goal is to kill people on the stand? I like the idea of having a person protect neutrals, but the goal of helping neutral players complete their goal can’t really be determined, especially for some neutrals, like scorned. I saw in earlier drafts that you had neutrals accepting your goal, but what if it was the other way around? What if in the very beginning you chose from the neutrals in the game and adopted their goal instead (Probably not including the NK.) You would get a certain amount of uses of all of their abilities (Day and night) and the game could track your progress together. For example, if you adopted the Fool’s goal, as soon as one of you was executed, you would win. Instead of choosing to bond with someone, the person’s goal you chose would be the one you were bonded with. You would still have peace treaty and conspire, with less charges of Showing your true colors or none at all. Then though, it isn’t really a peacekeeper anymore, maybe just a follower or something. No matter if you take my changes into consideration, right now it is just too hard to win as and doesn’t really have a defined objective. You also need to keep in mind that one of the main reasons Mercenary was changed was that it was too amplifying to NK or Cult/Unseen because it was basically just another number in their forces. It was unfun to play against and made mercenaries too powerful to evils and most of the time underwhelming to BDs.

item.title: [Class suggestion] Peace Keeper V.3
item.dc:creator: NOBLE1
item.description:
This is my third offical version of the PK, it takes some suggestions from @ShadowKnight and @Alice also, so this isn’t all mine. This class has to do with bounding to a target and helping them fulfill their goal. You can also bound with other players to see what they are claiming and to see if they could help you out in anyway

Ashen Communion (Passive) - At the start of the game, you will know the identity of all non-NK neutral players. If the NK remains the last neutral alive while you have still not won, then their identity will be revealed to you.

Grim Determination (Passive) - On days where no one die, you gain death immunity that night. You are immune to occupation, redirection and target changing

Peace Bond (Day) - [Unavailable on Day 1] You will bind yourself to a target player. While bound to that player, you can hear all whispers to and from them. If they are neutral then all whispers will be hidden from the public. You may only be bound to one player at a time and you will only be unbounded on their death or if you change to a new target.- [Infinite uses]

Peace treaty (Day) - Give your bounded target an extra use of all of their abilities, this includes day abilities. If they are a Mercanary or a Sellsword they will gain night immunity for the night. - [2 uses]

Showing your true colors (night) - Visit a player. If they are Neutral, they will be healed and protected from negative effects. If your target is immune for this night, then the ability cost is refunded. - [4 uses]

Conspire (Night) - [Unavailable before Night 2]. Create a group chat between yourself and a bonded player. - [Infinite uses]

Win Conditions - help 2 other neutral players complete their goals or win with the NK

Bonus gold - If you achieved your goal by helping 2 neutral players win then any other neutral player you help achieve their goal, you will gain 25 gold at the end of the game.
